Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/41st
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 47th, Cicero, Stevenson Expressway, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/41st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.
